description: we are looking for an enthusiastic and experienced senior node.js/angular full stack developer who is focused on quality. required skills: - 3+ years of experience in commercial software development; - experience developing rest apis - 1+ years of experience with nodejs/express; - experience with nosql, preferably mongodb; - knowledge of html/css3 - knowledge of angular 4+ - understanding micro services and serverless architectures - analytical thinking skills - git (basic commands, branching, merging) - fluent english (will speak with american stakeholders) as a plus: - experience unit tests - in-depth knowledge of database design and optimization; - experience with aws, heroku would be an advantage. responsibilities: - development and support of a web app and chrome extension from specifying requirements till production; - web front-end and back-end (node.js) development; - project integration with multiple internal/external systems; - participation in production incidents resolution.
name: nodejs angular full stack senior developer
